front.title: Session Description Protocol (SDP) Offer/Answer Clarifications for RTP/RTCP Multiplexing
front.abstract: This document updates RFC 5761 by clarifying the SDP offer/answer negotiation of RTP and RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) multiplexing. It makes it clear that an answerer can only include an "a=rtcp-mux" attribute in a Session Description Protocol (SDP) answer if the associated SDP offer contained the attribute.
